body:
Comment 2 by **lucio.dere**: 
I seem to have reduced the above (in context) to the following:

/home/lucio/Project/GoRelease/pkg/tool/netbsd_386/8g -o /tmp/_go_.8 -p
runtime -+ /home/lucio/Project/GoRelease/src/pkg/runtime/zruntime_defs_netbsd_386.go

other modules fail compilation in vacuo like the above, but this
produces the give error.

The two hosts I tried this on, one successful, the other failing, are
different: the one that crashes is definitely an older Intel CPU.
Both are NetBSD instances (same version) running under VMware ESXi
3.5.
